text: [Music]
hi everyone welcome to what's new with
AWS I'm Brandon West and here's the
latest updates
Amazon quantum ledger database is now
generally available ql DB provides a
complete immutable history of all
transactions that happen in the database
and their cryptographically verifiable
this is great for use cases like banking
transportation government records or any
time where you need a complete system
with record it's also server list which
means there's no need to provision
capacity or calculate your read and
write throughput QL DB will
automatically scale another exciting
service that's now available is Amazon
forecast it's a fully managed service
that uses machine learning to make
forecasts based on historical time
series data with automatic algorithm
selection you can let AWS choose the
best forecasting algorithm for your data
set you can then define your time frame
for the forecast and export the results
or query them directly we also have an
exciting update about our AWS Heroes
program AWS heroes are community members
that have been recognized for their
enthusiasm and leadership when it comes
to sharing AWS knowledge we have four
categories of at AWS heroes community
server lists machine learning and
containers we are announcing 12 new
heroes from around the world and we want
to say thank you to these new heroes for
being such an important part of our
community find out how you can get
involved and learn more about the AWS
heroes program from the link in the
description we're just about 80 days
away from reinvent so hopefully you've
got your registration and we'll see you
there for more news and announcements
make sure you're subscribed to this
channel follow me on twitter at V West
and thanks for tuning in
[Music]
